title: AOP Proxies as a Replacement for Events
description: Communication between two application modules is typically handled with events. Proxies provide a means to replace events, while offering other benefits.

title: The Semantic and Syntactic Implications of JavaScript Accessor Properties
description: Accessor properties could change the way you write and comprehend JavaScript.

title: A Useful Factory Construction Pattern Using Object Specifiers and Currying
description: Limit the parameters your methods have access to by currying. A useful pattern I picked up while perusing some of the Angular JS source code.

title: Creating an Angular Image Resize Directive with Photoshop Quality Using Canvas
description: Reduce the burden of slow networks on the performance of your application, take the responsibility of image downsizing off of your server.
